PerfectNetExp.abs: synapsid 中文是什么意思中文翻译英英解释安装"查查"工具栏,随时查词典单弓动物单弓类单孔亚纲合弓纲联会下孔纲下孔亚纲相关词汇.
下后脊||metalophid 下后尖||metaconid 下孔型||synapsid 下内附尖||entostylid 下内脊||entoflexid 下内尖||entoconid 下前脊||paralophid 下前尖||para.
在三叠纪早期和中期,恐龙尚未昌盛,鳄鱼的祖先先行奋发,和代表另一条路线的下孔类(synapsid)动物正面对抗,成功的把下孔类动物打入冷宫。在侏罗纪和白垩纪,鳄鱼和恐龙.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from modern Latin Synapsida, from Greek sun- 'together' + apsis, apsid- 'arch'

means.word_mean: 1. extinct reptile having a single pair of lateral temporal openings in the skull

auth_sentence.content: The early synapsid mammalian ancestors were sphenacodont pelycosaurs, a group that also included Dimetrodon.
auth_sentence.res_content: The early synapsid mammalian ancestors were sphenacodont pelycosaurs, a group that also included Dimetrodon.
